nl.weeaboo.vn.core

Interface ISkipState

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public interface ISkipState
extends java.io.Serializable
    Skip, pause, auto read state.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SkipMode getSkipMode()
      The current skip mode.
      void handleInput(IInput input)
      Process user input.
      boolean isSkipping()
      true if currently skipping.
      void setSkipMode(SkipMode mode)
      Changes the current skip mode.
      boolean shouldSkipLine(boolean lineRead)
      true if the text line should be skipped according to the current skip mode.
      void skip(SkipMode mode)
      Increases the skip level to the specified mode.
      void stopSkipping()
      Equivalent to setSkipMode(SkipMode.NONE)

    • Method Detail

      • isSkipping

        boolean isSkipping()
        true if currently skipping.

      • shouldSkipLine

        boolean shouldSkipLine(boolean lineRead)
        true if the text line should be skipped according to the current skip mode.

      • getSkipMode

        SkipMode getSkipMode()
        The current skip mode.

      • setSkipMode

        void setSkipMode(SkipMode mode)
        Changes the current skip mode.

      • skip

        void skip(SkipMode mode)
        Increases the skip level to the specified mode. If the skip level is already at that level or higher, nothing is changed.

      • stopSkipping

        void stopSkipping()
        Equivalent to setSkipMode(SkipMode.NONE)
        See Also:
        setSkipMode(SkipMode)

      • handleInput

        void handleInput(IInput input)
        Process user input.
